name: Synergetica
description:
Introduction:

Welcome to Synergetica! This is a short turn-based RPG, aimed to be a compact, but dense and dynamic experience. Through this bite-sized adventure, your characters will grow immensely through the adventure and learn a large variety of skills!

This version is heavily untested, so balance makes the game hard to play. I'll be working hard to make an update to make it the fun game it's meant to be!

However, core systems do work properly, so you can get a good idea of what the final product will be like!

Overview:

The game is divided into 3 parts:

1) The world map, where you'll explore the world through various events

2) Visual novel scenes, where you'll experience the story of Synergetica

3) Battles, where you'll need to defeat the foes that stand in your way

Gameplay:

Synergetica features a unique battle system that gives all units on the field two moves - a Primary and a Support. 

Through Supports, you can augment your allies, giving them all sorts of buffs and advantages.

Through Primaries, you can dish out the damage to the enemies or help yourself out.

Utilizing both types of moves, there's ton of ways to get creative with your strategies!

Story:

Krista and Piper take notice of the fabled Obsidian Drake - a ferocious beast. The pair depart on a journey to take care of the immense threat before it has the chance to bring destruction upon their beloved village.

But many obstacles and encounters awaits them on their journey!

Can you reach the summit of the mountain, the den of the legendary Drake?

Controls:

WASD/Arrows - Directional input

Enter/Space - Confirm/Continue

Backspace - Back/Speed up text

There's limited mouse controls. Controller is not properly implemented yet, but you might be able to get it to work.

We hope you have fun in the world of Synergetica!
